settings.title: Tailscale Settings
settings.description: Configure Tailscale status display and behavior
settings.refresh-interval-desc: How often to check Tailscale status
settings.compact-mode-desc: Show only icon in the bar
settings.show-ip-desc: Display Tailscale IP in the bar widget
settings.show-peers-desc: Display connected device count in the bar
settings.hide-disconnected-desc: Only show online peers in the panel
settings.terminal-command-desc: Command to launch terminal for SSH/ping (e.g., 'ghostty', 'alacritty', 'kitty')
settings.ping-count-desc: Number of ping packets to send when testing connectivity
settings.default-peer-action-desc: Action when clicking on a peer in the panel

terminal-not-configured.title: Terminal Not Configured
terminal-not-configured.message: Please set a terminal command in plugin settings

terminal-warning.title: Terminal Not Configured
terminal-warning.message: Set a terminal command in settings to enable SSH and ping
